FuncDef: The display explicit-path command displays information about an explicit path and tunnels using it.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an explicit path.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-insensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: Path Name :    main     Path Status :  Enabled
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Information about an explicit path and tunnels using it needs to be obtained.
Implementation Procedure
If the explicit path is used by more than 20 tunnels, the system will segment the output information explicitly, and the 20 interfaces are one segment.
Precautions
If no path name is specified, information about all explicit paths is displayed.
